item.title: Anki as a learning trampoline
item.description: tips and tricks https://senrigan.io/blog/everything-i-know-strategies-tips-and-tricks-for-spaced-repetition-anki/ Anki Tips: What I Learned Making 10,000 Flashcards https://rs.io/anki-tips/ Better Anki Usage Guide https://andrewzah.com/posts/2019/better-anki-usage-guide/ augmenting long-term memory http://augmentingcognition.com/ltm.html as a bonus - really nice writeup about cognition from Michael Nielsen: http://cognitivemedium.com/tat/
